l99g130qrpxNpDQ7.name: Blinding Pigment
l99g130qrpxNpDQ7.description:
Requirements: A paint pot or oil flask, a hand free

Make a ranged weapon attack against a target within 15 feet of you with the paint pot or oil flask, expending it. On a hit, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + your Dexterity modifier, is affected as if you had splashed them with the paint pot normally, and must make a Constitution save against your maneuver DC or be blinded until the end of its next turn.
